definition: epidemic encephalitis B (abbr. for 乙型腦炎|乙型脑炎[yi3 xing2 nao3 yan2])

second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]

sentences.english: JE epidemic occurred mainly in Asia and some of the Southeast Asian countries in the past.
sentences.chinese: 過去乙腦主要在亞洲和東南亞的一些國家流行。

sentences.english: Vaccination and anti-mosquito measure appear to be most important to control the spreading of Japanese B encephalitis infection.
sentences.chinese: 接種乙腦疫苗和滅蚊是預防控制乙腦流行的重要措施。

sentences.english: Vaccination and anti-mosquito measure appear to be most important to control the spreading of Japanese B encephalitis infection.
sentences.chinese: 接種乙腦疫苗和滅蚊是預防控制乙腦流行的重要措施。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effeciency of potassium dehydroandrographolide succinate injection to epidemic encephalitis B patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察穿琥寧注射液對乙腦患兒的治療效果。

sentences.english: An estimated three billion people live in JE-endemic areas.
sentences.chinese: 估計約有30億人生活在乙腦流行的地區。

sentences.english: Disease is not cured during the period, it is best not to JE vaccine injection.
sentences.chinese: 疾病未治癒期間，最好不要注射乙腦預防針。

pinyin: feng1 shi1 xing4 guan1 jie2 yan2

definition: lit. the disease is cured the moment the medicine is taken (idiom)/fig. (of a medical treatment) to give instant results/(of a solution or method) highly effective
injury such as contusion, sprain or fracture from falling, blow etc
